insight: The `+` operator on variables (`{var+}`) bleeds formatting (underline, bold) into the added space because it appends a raw `" "`. The fix in Foundation (Variables.java, Replacer.java, HookManager.java) is to append `ChatColor.RESET + " " + ChatColor.getLastColors(textBeforeVariable)` so the space is neutral but preceding colors are restored for subsequent text.
